p: New pipe sections, which have the same pipe material with the leaking pipe, were collected. Steel specimens were machined from the pipe sections. The dimensions of specimens from the 2″ steel pipe are 40 × 13 × 2 mm 3, and those from the 4″ and 6″ steel pipes are 40 × 13 × 3 mm 3. All the specimens were ground to 2000-grade emery paper and cleaned with distilled water and absolute ethyl alcohol.
